title: API Reference
description: Detailed API reference for the UploadShad component and its related utilities.

body.raw:
# UploadShad API Reference

## UploadShad

The main component that wraps the file upload functionality.

### Props

| Prop            | Type                        | Default     | Description                               |
| --------------- | --------------------------- | ----------- | ----------------------------------------- |
| `folderId`      | `string`                    | `undefined` | Optional folder ID for organizing uploads |
| `defaultValues` | `string[]`                  | `undefined` | Initial array of file URLs                |
| `handleChange`  | `(files: string[]) => void` | `undefined` | Callback function when files change       |
| `metadata`      | `Record<string, string>`    | `undefined` | Optional metadata for uploads             |

## FileInput

Component for handling file input and drag-and-drop functionality.

### Props

| Prop            | Type                                           | Default             | Description                     |
| --------------- | ---------------------------------------------- | ------------------- | ------------------------------- |
| `value`         | `File[]`                                       | `undefined`         | Array of selected files         |
| `onValueChange` | `React.Dispatch<React.SetStateAction<File[]>>` | `undefined`         | Callback for value changes      |
| `accept`        | `{ [key: string]: string[] }`                  | `{ "image/*": [] }` | Accepted file types             |
| `maxsize`       | `number`                                       | `1024 * 1024 * 2`   | Maximum file size in bytes      |
| `maxfiles`      | `number`                                       | `1`                 | Maximum number of files allowed |
| `disabled`      | `boolean`                                      | `false`             | Disables the input if true      |
| `customLoader`  | `(props: ImageLoaderProps) => string`          | `undefined`         | Custom image loader function    |

## FilesPreview

Component for displaying and managing uploaded files.

### Props

| Prop           | Type                                  | Default     | Description                  |
| -------------- | ------------------------------------- | ----------- | ---------------------------- |
| `customLoader` | `(props: ImageLoaderProps) => string` | `undefined` | Custom image loader function |

## S3Service

Utility class for interacting with AWS S3.

### Methods

| Method         | Parameters                | Return Type                                             | Description                            |
| -------------- | ------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------- | -------------------------------------- |
| `getSignedURL` | `FilePayload, AWSOptions` | `Promise<{ signedURL: string } \| { failure: string }>` | Generates a signed URL for file upload |
| `deleteFile`   | `url: string`             | `Promise<{ success: boolean } \| { failure: any }>`     | Deletes a file from S3                 |
| `deleteFiles`  | `files: string[]`         | `Promise<void>`                                         | Deletes multiple files from S3         |

## Hooks

### useFilesContext

Custom hook for accessing the files context within the UploadShad component.

### useControllableState

Custom hook for managing controlled and uncontrolled state.

## Types

### FilePayload
